<h3 id="X26312">X(26312) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 5th ANTI-BROCARD AND LUCAS HOMOTHETIC</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (SB+SC)*(((SA-3*SW)*S^2+2*(2*SA+SW)*SW^2)*S+(4*(SA-SW)*R^2+SA^2-2*SB*SC+4*SW^2)*S^2+3*SA^2*SW^2)  :  :
